Beauty Without Cruelty Lavender Highland Shampoo - Imported (200 ml) Price: Rs.2700

Beauty Without Cruelty Lavender Highland Shampoo 16 fl oz (200 ml). Lavender Highland rejuvenates all hair types BWC Lavender Highland Shampoo is a gentle plant-based formula that thoroughly cleans your hair while restoring its natural balance body and shine. Pure premium aroma-therapeutic essential oil of Lavender Highland the world s most prized lavender from the high mountain regions of France rejuvenates and revitalizes your hair to improve its look and feel. Nature s own special botanicals with select vitamins and natural plant proteins fortify each hair strand. Your hair will be naturally clean healthy and beautiful. Ideal for daily use. Organic ingredients NOP or Ecocert certified by BCS CCOF
